Message.Title: TABLETS SALES UP 59% == BUY NOW FOR 18
Dell's Poor Service led me to HP
Message.Msg: I was one click away from ordering a laptop on line. I called the toll free number for a last second question about a spec. Extremely poor service, at least three different peolpe would not answer a simple question. thanks Dell, because I ordered an HP cheaper and better specs. I currently own both so I am aware of strengths and weaknesses of the brands. It is going to be very hard for this company to execute and turn around.
